title: State Of Npm 2023: The Overview
content: In this article, the Sandworm team provides an in-depth analysis of the current state of npm, the popular package manager for JavaScript. With millions of developers relying on npm, it has revolutionized the way JavaScript code is built and shared. The expansive npm registry houses over 3.3 million packages, fueling innovation and empowering developers to create remarkable applications with ease. The article explores fascinating statistics and facts about npm, including its origins as a CouchDB service, the evolution of its name, and its acquisition by GitHub in 2020. Developers will gain insights into the trends, patterns, and vibrant ecosystem of npm, making it a must-read for those looking to stay updated in the JavaScript community.
